blackrusemod:_DummyAttack.NAME: Attack
blackrusemod:_DummyAttack.DESCRIPTION: Next turn, the enemy intends to attack.

blackrusemod:_DummyNotAttack.NAME: Not Attack
blackrusemod:_DummyNotAttack.DESCRIPTION: Next turn, the enemy does not intend to attack.

blackrusemod:InstantArmor.NAME: Instant Armor
blackrusemod:InstantArmor.DESCRIPTION: Innate. NL Gain !BRM_P! blackrusemod:Protection. NL Convert 3 blackrusemod:Knives to blackrusemod:Satellites. NL Exhaust.

blackrusemod:Alleviate.NAME: Alleviate
blackrusemod:Alleviate.DESCRIPTION: Discard up to 3 cards. NL Gain !B! Block for each discarded card.

blackrusemod:PendulumOfEternity.NAME: Pendulum of Eternity
blackrusemod:PendulumOfEternity.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Apply !M! Vulnerable. NL Apply !M! Weak. NL blackrusemod:Shift: Costs 1 less [B] .

blackrusemod:Orbit.NAME: Orbit
blackrusemod:Orbit.DESCRIPTION: Convert !M! blackrusemod:Knives to blackrusemod:Satellites. NL Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies for each blackrusemod:Satellite you have.

blackrusemod:Comet.NAME: Comet
blackrusemod:Comet.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Draw !M! cards. NL Draw 1 less card for each card you have played this turn.
blackrusemod:Comet.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Draw !M! card. NL Draw 1 less card for each card you have played this turn.

blackrusemod:Dilation.NAME: Dilation
blackrusemod:Dilation.DESCRIPTION: Gain !BRM_P! blackrusemod:Protection. NL This card's blackrusemod:Protection is increased by 1 this combat.

blackrusemod:Moondial.NAME: Moondial
blackrusemod:Moondial.DESCRIPTION: Add !M! random blackrusemod:Temporal cards to your hand and your draw pile. NL Exhaust.

blackrusemod:Deny.NAME: Deny
blackrusemod:Deny.DESCRIPTION: Look at your NL draw pile. NL You may discard NL up to !M! cards. NL Exhaust.
blackrusemod:Deny.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Look at your NL draw pile. NL You may discard NL up to !M! cards.

blackrusemod:DoubleEdge.NAME: Double Edge
blackrusemod:DoubleEdge.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Apply !M! Vulnerable. NL blackrusemod:Backlash.

blackrusemod:DualDimension.NAME: Dual Dimension
blackrusemod:DualDimension.DESCRIPTION: Double your blackrusemod:Protection. NL Exhaust. NL blackrusemod:Shift: Gain !BRM_P! blackrusemod:Protection.

blackrusemod:Duplication.NAME: Duplication
blackrusemod:Duplication.DESCRIPTION: Duplicate !M! card. NL The duplicate NL costs 0 this turn. NL blackrusemod:Backlash. NL Exhaust.
blackrusemod:Duplication.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Duplicate !M! cards. NL The duplicates NL cost 0 this turn. NL blackrusemod:Backlash. NL Exhaust.

blackrusemod:Embodiment.NAME: Embodiment
blackrusemod:Embodiment.DESCRIPTION: At the end of your turn, shuffle a random blackrusemod:Temporal card into your draw pile.
blackrusemod:Embodiment.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: At the end your turn, shuffle a random upgraded blackrusemod:Temporal card into your draw pile.

blackrusemod:Defy.NAME: Defy
blackrusemod:Defy.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL You are not affected by Weak, Vulnerable or Frail for 1 turn.
blackrusemod:Defy.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL You are not affected by Weak, Vulnerable or Frail for 1 turn. NL Retain.

blackrusemod:FanOfKnives.NAME: Fan of Knives
blackrusemod:FanOfKnives.DESCRIPTION: Throw 1 blackrusemod:Knife at each enemy X times. NL Each deals !D! damage.

blackrusemod:FastForward.NAME: Fast Forward
blackrusemod:FastForward.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL If there are no Attack cards in your hand, draw !M! cards.

blackrusemod:Ricochet.NAME: Ricochet
blackrusemod:Ricochet.DESCRIPTION: Throw 1 blackrusemod:Knife. NL It deals !D! damage and bounces between enemies !M! times.

blackrusemod:FlawlessForm.NAME: Flawless Form
blackrusemod:FlawlessForm.DESCRIPTION: Gain !BRM_P! blackrusemod:Protection. NL You are not affected by Weak, Vulnerable, or Frail.
blackrusemod:FlawlessForm.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Gain !BRM_P! blackrusemod:Protection. NL You are not affected by Weak, Vulnerable, or Frail. NL Retain.

blackrusemod:FloweringNight.NAME: Flowering Night
blackrusemod:FloweringNight.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you play a card, draw a card. NL You may only draw NL !M! cards each turn NL this way.

blackrusemod:Initiator.NAME: Initiator
blackrusemod:Initiator.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Add Follow Up NL to your hand.
blackrusemod:Initiator.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Add Follow Up+ NL to your hand.

blackrusemod:FollowUp.NAME: Follow Up
blackrusemod:FollowUp.DESCRIPTION: Ethereal. NL Deal !D! damage. NL Add Follow Up 2 NL to your hand. NL Exhaust.
blackrusemod:FollowUp.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Ethereal. NL Deal !D! damage. NL Add Follow Up 2+ NL to your hand. NL Exhaust.

blackrusemod:FollowUp2.NAME: Follow Up 2
blackrusemod:FollowUp2.DESCRIPTION: Ethereal. NL Deal !D! damage. NL Add Finishing Touch NL to your hand. NL Exhaust.
blackrusemod:FollowUp2.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Ethereal. NL Deal !D! damage. NL Add Finishing Touch+ NL to your hand. NL Exhaust.

blackrusemod:FinishingTouch.NAME: Finishing Touch
blackrusemod:FinishingTouch.DESCRIPTION: Ethereal. NL Deal !D! damage. NL Gain 1 blackrusemod:Elegance. NL Exhaust.

blackrusemod:Hightail.NAME: Hightail
blackrusemod:Hightail.DESCRIPTION: Gain !BRM_P! blackrusemod:Protection NL X times. NL blackrusemod:Backlash.

blackrusemod:Advance.NAME: Advance
blackrusemod:Advance.DESCRIPTION: Put !M! Cost 0 cards from your draw pile into your hand.
blackrusemod:Advance.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Innate. NL Put !M! Cost 0 cards from your draw pile into your hand.

blackrusemod:ForgedInTime.NAME: Forge in Time
blackrusemod:ForgedInTime.DESCRIPTION: Exhaust your hand. NL Gain !BRM_P! blackrusemod:Protection and 2 blackrusemod:Knives for each exhausted card. NL Exhaust.

blackrusemod:Gouge.NAME: Gouge
blackrusemod:Gouge.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage and apply 1 blackrusemod:Blight X times. NL Exhaust.
blackrusemod:Gouge.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage and apply 1 blackrusemod:Blight X+1 times. NL Exhaust.

blackrusemod:BestPractice.NAME: Best Practice
blackrusemod:BestPractice.DESCRIPTION: At the start of your turn, you may upgrade 1 card in your hand for the rest of combat.

blackrusemod:Exchange.NAME: Exchange
blackrusemod:Exchange.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Discard !M! cards. NL Obtain !M! blackrusemod:Knives. NL Retain.

blackrusemod:KidneyShot.NAME: Kidney Shot
blackrusemod:KidneyShot.DESCRIPTION: Throw !M! blackrusemod:Knives. NL Each deals !D! damage and applies 1 Weak.

blackrusemod:WasteNot.NAME: Waste Not
blackrusemod:WasteNot.DESCRIPTION: At the end of your turn, spend all [B] . NL Draw 1 more card next turn for each [B] spent.

blackrusemod:KillingDoll.NAME: Killing Doll
blackrusemod:KillingDoll.DESCRIPTION: Throw ALL blackrusemod:Knives. NL Each deals !D! damage to a random enemy. NL Exhaust.

blackrusemod:Collapse.NAME: Collapse
blackrusemod:Collapse.DESCRIPTION: Deal damage equal to your current blackrusemod:Protection to ALL enemies.

blackrusemod:Manipulate.NAME: Manipulate
blackrusemod:Manipulate.DESCRIPTION: Shuffle X+1 random blackrusemod:Temporal cards into your draw pile.
blackrusemod:Manipulate.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Shuffle X+2 random blackrusemod:Temporal cards into your draw pile.

blackrusemod:Misdirection.NAME: Misdirect
blackrusemod:Misdirection.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Apply !M! blackrusemod:Blight and Weak.

blackrusemod:MoonPhase.NAME: Moon Phase
blackrusemod:MoonPhase.DESCRIPTION: At the end of your turn, gain !M! Block for each stack of Weak, Vulnerable and Frail on you.

blackrusemod:Moonlight.NAME: Moonlight
blackrusemod:Moonlight.DESCRIPTION: Throw !M! blackrusemod:Knives. NL Each deals !D! damage and applies 1 Vulnerable.

blackrusemod:BottledTime.NAME: Bottled Time
blackrusemod:BottledTime.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Innate. NL Draw !M! cards. NL Exhaust.

blackrusemod:MurderousAura.NAME: Murderous Aura
blackrusemod:MurderousAura.DESCRIPTION: At the start of your turn, apply 1 blackrusemod:Blight to ALL enemies.
blackrusemod:MurderousAura.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Innate. NL At the start of your turn, apply 1 blackrusemod:Blight to ALL enemies.

blackrusemod:Read.NAME: Read
blackrusemod:Read.DESCRIPTION: blackrusemod:Vision: Gain !BRM_P! blackrusemod:Protection and apply !M! Weak.

blackrusemod:DancingSilver.NAME: Dancing Silver
blackrusemod:DancingSilver.DESCRIPTION: Convert !M! blackrusemod:Knives to blackrusemod:Satellites. NL Gain 2 Block for each blackrusemod:Satellite you have.

blackrusemod:Potential.NAME: Potential
blackrusemod:Potential.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL blackrusemod:Shift: Increase this card's damage by !M! this combat and put this card into NL your hand.

blackrusemod:Desolation.NAME: Desolation
blackrusemod:Desolation.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Double the NL enemy's blackrusemod:Blight. NL Exhaust.

blackrusemod:Deadline.NAME: Deadline
blackrusemod:Deadline.DESCRIPTION: blackrusemod:Vision: Apply !M! blackrusemod:Blight and Vulnerable. NL Exhaust.

blackrusemod:RealityMarble.NAME: Reality Marble
blackrusemod:RealityMarble.DESCRIPTION: Innate. NL At the end of your turn, Retain up to !M! card. NL The card you retained loses Ethereal this combat.
blackrusemod:RealityMarble.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Innate. NL At the end of your turn, Retain up to !M! cards. NL The cards you retain lose Ethereal this combat.

blackrusemod:Replace.NAME: Replace
blackrusemod:Replace.DESCRIPTION: Discard a card from your draw pile. NL Place a card from your discard pile on top of your draw pile.

blackrusemod:Reset.NAME: Reset
blackrusemod:Reset.DESCRIPTION: Clear ALL Weak, Vulnerable and Frail. NL Each stack gives you !BRM_P! blackrusemod:Protection. NL Exhaust.

blackrusemod:ReturningBlade.NAME: Returning Blade
blackrusemod:ReturningBlade.DESCRIPTION: blackrusemod:Vision: Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies and put this card NL into your hand. NL Can be upgraded any number of times.

blackrusemod:Shuttle.NAME: Shuttle
blackrusemod:Shuttle.DESCRIPTION: Activate card and relic effects that will activate at the start of your next turn. NL Exhaust.

blackrusemod:Rewind.NAME: Rewind
blackrusemod:Rewind.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Put the card at the bottom of your discard pile into NL your hand.

blackrusemod:Sabotage.NAME: Sabotage
blackrusemod:Sabotage.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Enemy loses NL that much Strength for 1 turn. NL Exhaust.

blackrusemod:ShiftingGears.NAME: Shifting Gears
blackrusemod:ShiftingGears.DESCRIPTION: Draw !M! cards. NL blackrusemod:Shift: Gain 1 blackrusemod:Elegance.

blackrusemod:ShatteredReality.NAME: Shattered Reality
blackrusemod:ShatteredReality.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL blackrusemod:Shift: Deal DOUBLE damage to ALL enemies.

blackrusemod:SilverMatrix.NAME: Silver Matrix
blackrusemod:SilverMatrix.DESCRIPTION: Convert !M! blackrusemod:Knives to blackrusemod:Satellites. NL Gain 1 blackrusemod:Matrix for each blackrusemod:Satellite you have.

blackrusemod:SilverBlades.NAME: Silver Blades
blackrusemod:SilverBlades.DESCRIPTION: blackrusemod:Knives and blackrusemod:Satellites deal !M! additional damage. NL At the start NL of your turn, NL obtain !M! blackrusemod:Knives.

blackrusemod:Snipe.NAME: Snipe
blackrusemod:Snipe.DESCRIPTION: blackrusemod:Vision: Throw 1 blackrusemod:Knife. NL It deals !D! damage and applies !M! Vulnerable.

blackrusemod:Solidify.NAME: Solidify
blackrusemod:Solidify.DESCRIPTION: Choose 1 blackrusemod:Temporal card and place it on top of your draw pile. NL Exhaust.
blackrusemod:Solidify.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Choose 1 blackrusemod:Temporal card twice and place it on top of your draw pile. NL Exhaust.

blackrusemod:SoulSculpture.NAME: Soul Sculpture
blackrusemod:SoulSculpture.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage NL 6 times. NL Enemy loses NL !M! Strength. NL Exhaust.

blackrusemod:SpecialFormula.NAME: Special Formula
blackrusemod:SpecialFormula.DESCRIPTION: Gain [B] . NL Heal !M! HP. NL blackrusemod:Backlash. NL Exhaust.

blackrusemod:Spin.NAME: Spin
blackrusemod:Spin.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage and apply !M! Weak to ALL enemies. NL blackrusemod:Backlash.

blackrusemod:StarChef.NAME: Star Chef
blackrusemod:StarChef.DESCRIPTION: Ethereal. NL At the start of your turn, you may exhaust 1 card and gain [B] .
blackrusemod:StarChef.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: At the start of your turn, you may exhaust 1 card and gain [B] .

blackrusemod:Starlight.NAME: Starlight
blackrusemod:Starlight.DESCRIPTION: Throw !M! blackrusemod:Knives. NL Each deals !D! damage to a random enemy and draws 1 card.

blackrusemod:Foresight.NAME: Foresight
blackrusemod:Foresight.DESCRIPTION: At the start of your turn, Scry !M!.

blackrusemod:Sunlight.NAME: Sunlight
blackrusemod:Sunlight.DESCRIPTION: Throw 1 blackrusemod:Knife. NL It deals !D! damage NL and applies !M! blackrusemod:Blight NL to ALL enemies.

blackrusemod:SuppressingFire.NAME: Suppressing Fire
blackrusemod:SuppressingFire.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you throw or convert a blackrusemod:Knife, gain !M! Block.

blackrusemod:TimeTheft.NAME: Time Theft
blackrusemod:TimeTheft.DESCRIPTION: blackrusemod:Vision: Gain [B] [B] . NL Draw !M! cards. NL Exhaust.
blackrusemod:TimeTheft.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: blackrusemod:Vision: Gain [B] [B] [B] . NL Draw !M! cards. NL Exhaust.

blackrusemod:TemporalDefense.NAME: T. Defend
blackrusemod:TemporalDefense.DESCRIPTION: Ethereal. NL Gain !B! Block. NL Gain !BRM_P! blackrusemod:Protection. NL Exhaust.

blackrusemod:TemporalEssence.NAME: T. Essence
blackrusemod:TemporalEssence.DESCRIPTION: Ethereal. NL Gain [B] . NL Draw !M! cards. NL Exhaust.
blackrusemod:TemporalEssence.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Ethereal. NL Gain [B] [B] . NL Draw !M! cards. NL Exhaust.

blackrusemod:TemporalMisd.NAME: T. Misdirect
blackrusemod:TemporalMisd.DESCRIPTION: Ethereal. NL Apply !M! blackrusemod:Blight and Weak to ALL enemies. NL Exhaust.

blackrusemod:TemporalSlicing.NAME: T. Slice
blackrusemod:TemporalSlicing.DESCRIPTION: Ethereal. NL Deal !D! damage !M! times to ALL enemies. NL Exhaust.

blackrusemod:TheWorld.NAME: The World
blackrusemod:TheWorld.DESCRIPTION: Draw !M! cards. NL The next card you play this turn costs 0. Exhaust.

blackrusemod:Contraction.NAME: Contraction
blackrusemod:Contraction.DESCRIPTION: Gain !BRM_P! blackrusemod:Protection. NL Convert all Block to blackrusemod:Protection.

blackrusemod:TimeWarp.NAME: Time Warp
blackrusemod:TimeWarp.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Discard !M! card. NL blackrusemod:Shift: Draw 1 card.
blackrusemod:TimeWarp.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Discard !M! cards. NL blackrusemod:Shift: Draw 1 card.

blackrusemod:Revamp.NAME: Revamp
blackrusemod:Revamp.DESCRIPTION: Put !M! card from your discard pile into your hand and upgrade it. NL Exhaust.
blackrusemod:Revamp.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Put !M! card from your discard pile into your hand and upgrade it.

blackrusemod:TrueSight.NAME: True Sight
blackrusemod:TrueSight.DESCRIPTION: blackrusemod:Vision effects will always be triggered.
blackrusemod:TrueSight.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: blackrusemod:Vision effects will always be triggered. NL Retain.

blackrusemod:Unruled.NAME: Unruled
blackrusemod:Unruled.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL For each stack of Weak, Vulnerable and Frail on you, deal !M! additional damage.

blackrusemod:LightFlow.NAME: Light Flow
blackrusemod:LightFlow.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage NL 3 times. NL blackrusemod:Backlash.
